metadata.name: LordOfTheFlies
metadata.description:
[h1][b]Lord Of The Flies[/b][/h1]
[b]Features[/b] - This mod gives the first player all of the Fly Passive Items & Trinkets and removes them from the item pool - Beelzebub Transformation. [list] [*]Items [list] [*]Smart Fly [*]Psy Fly [*]Lost Fly [*]Papa Fly [*]The Swarm [*]Angry Fly [*]Bot Fly [*]Fruity Fly [*]Skatole [*]Halo of Flies [*]Distant Admiration [*]Forever Alone [*]BBF [*]Big Fan [*]Friend Zone [*]Obsessed Fan [*]??? Only Friend [*]The Mulligan [*]YO LISTEN! [/list] [*]Trinkets [list] [*]Locust of War [*]Locust of Pestilence [*]Locust of Famine [*]Locust of Death [*]Locust of Conquest [*]Apollyons Best Friend [/list] [/list]
- As having the above is extemely OP the following happens when being hit by a spider enemy (it is still OP!) [list] [*]100% chance of losing a trinket [*]82-90% chance of losing a passive item (higher luck stat reduced % by maximum of 8) [*]22-30% chance of losing a second passive item (higher luck stat reduced % by maximum of 8) [/list]
- [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]Mod Config Menu Continued[/url] Support [list] [*]Turn Items on or off [*]Turn Trinkets on or off [/list]
[b]Source[/b] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2487535818]GitHub Repo[/url] -
